document_data.caption: A map showing Aspengheight on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Aspenheight
document_data.mainbody: '''Aspenheight''' was a mountain range located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The mountain range was located in northwestern Gwynneth along the coast of the [[Strait of the Leviathan]]. Aspenheight formed part of the western border of [[Myrloch Vale]]. It was separated from [[the Highlands]] mountain range by the [[Aspenheight Gap]]. Several unnamed rivers flowed into the Strait of the Leviathan from the mountains.
